_meta.description: Domain profile for alerts, notifications, sounds, and user feedback shortcuts

prompt_context: You are generating a notification/feedback Apple Shortcut. Use notification to show system banners (with title, body, sound, and optional attachment). Use alert/showalert for modal dialogs requiring user acknowledgment. Use speaktext for text-to-speech output. Use playsound for audio feedback. For confirmation dialogs, use showalert with ShowCancelButton=true and handle both outcomes with IF. Choose the right feedback mechanism: notifications for background updates, alerts for foreground confirmations, speaktext for hands-free contexts.

sound.use_case: Completion chimes, error sounds, timer alerts

example_patterns: Show notification with title and body when background task completes
Alert with confirm/cancel buttons, branch on user choice
Speak current time and weather summary for hands-free morning briefing
